detail_desc: Sports trousers in sturdy, fast-drying jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a leg pocket with a taped zip. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
V-neck cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, buttons down the front and front pockets. Ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem.
Trunks in stretch mesh with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a round neck and rounded, slightly longer back. One top has an all-over print.
Leggings with an elasticated waist and smooth trim with overlocked seams at the hems. High waist for a good fit over the tummy. 60 denier.
5-pocket bootcut jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, and flared legs.

Set with a top and trousers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with long sleeves, press-studs on one shoulder (except in sizes 1-4Y) and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Pyjama bottoms in jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Joggers in lightweight jersey made from a cotton blend with a ribbed, elasticated waistband, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems. The cotton content of the joggers is organic.

Short, voluminous dress in a cotton weave with a round neckline, wide armholes and long, super-wide sleeves with narrow, close-fitting cuffs. Detachable tie belt and a bell-shaped skirt with inset panels for added width and volume. Lined.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Wide-fitting top with short dolman sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Shorts with an elasticated waist.

Sports vest top in ribbed fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and decorative seams at the sides. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Swim pants with a laser-cut frilled trim at the top and narrow elastication at the waist. Lined gusset.
Push-up bra in microfibre and lace with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in soft, washed denim. High paper bag waist with a detachable belt, zip fly and two buttons. Unlined.
Knee-length airy chiffon skirt in a silk blend with a jacquard-weave pattern. Regular waist, concealed zip at the back and an asymmetric hem. Satin lining.

Block-heeled ankle boots in imitation leather and imitation suede with a zip in one side and decorative straps with a metal buckle. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8 cm.
Thin metal chain necklaces with round pendants. Adjustable length approx. 43-50 cm and 50-58 cm.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, ribbed, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved sports top in airy, organic cotton jersey with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Sleeveless, gently flared tunic in soft viscose jersey. Lined at the top.
Wide, fabric-covered Alice band with a knot detail on the top.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Lace balconette bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups to provide good support and a fuller cleavage. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a wide fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes..
Fitted, calf-length dress in stretch jersey with zigzag seams around the neckline and armholes. Narrow cut at the top, a racer back and a slit in one side.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side, fake back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Boxy-style cardigan in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Shirt in checked cotton flannel with a collar and chest pocket. Regular fit.
Ballet pumps in imitation patent leather with an adjustable strap over the foot, a grosgrain loop at the back and glittery heels. Satin linings and insoles, and fluted soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Suede slip-on trainers with a lightly padded top edge and elastic gores in the sides. Leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Running scarf in fast-drying functional fabric designed to keep you warm and protect you from bad weather. Ventilation holes at the front to make it easier to breathe while running, and a reflective detail. Thermal fleece lining.
Tailored trousers in a stretch weave with a high waist, zip fly and concealed hook-eye-fasteners. Pockets in the side seams, fake back pockets and tapered legs with creases and satin side stripes.
Trainers with a padded top edge and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Blouse in a patterned weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and long sleeves with narrow smocking and ties at the cuffs.
Long metal earrings in various designs. Length approx 9.5 and 10 cm.
LIMITED EDITION. Calf-length dress in an airy cotton weave with hole-embroidered sections. V-neck and concealed elastication at the waist with gathers front and back. Lined.
Pyjama T-shirt and shorts in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with contrasting colour ribbing around the neckline and sleeves. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a V-shaped opening at the front and long, wide sleeves with wide ribbing at the cuffs.
Sleeveless, A-line blouse in chiffon with sequin appliqués, a small, frilled collar, gathers at the top and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Lined.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hairbands in a cotton blend with a bow at the front and covered elastic at the back.
Leggings in stretch, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
V-neck top in satin with lace trims, a sewn-in wrapover at the front and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Narrow elasticated seam at the waist and a gentle flare to the hem.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft pattern knit with hole-knit sections, long, wide sleeves and a flounce at the cuffs and hem. Stocking-stitched back.
Fitted, knee-length dress in soft, ribbed jersey with a small stand-up collar and long sleeves. Detachable belt with a round plastic buckle, and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.

Running jacket in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with a mesh-lined hood, zip down the front and zipped chest pocket. Ventilation holes under the arms, ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Reflective details. Unlined. Tight fit. Size of chest pocket 10x17.5 cm.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a high cut at the back. The polyester content of the outer fabric is partly recycled. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.

Shirt in soft, brushed cotton twill with a grandad collar and buttons down the front. Two flap chest pockets with a button and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Jumper in soft, rib-knit cotton with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Dress in airy chiffon with elastication around the top, narrow, braided shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and an asymmetric hem. Lined.

Dress in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs, a visible elastic waistband and a gathered, flared skirt.
Treggings in washed stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
Joggers in woven fabric with a high, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs with sewn-in creases at the front.
Block-coloured T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in soft, rib-knit organic cotton with buttons down the front and sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs.
Gently flared, calf-length skirt in sturdy satin with a regular waist. Concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at one side. Unlined.
Short-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a deep V-neck and ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Fitted T-shirt in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a V-neck front and back.
Leggings in denim with appliqués on the knees, an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Relaxed-fit shorts in a rustle-weave cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets with a press-stud.
Soft slippers with a motif, elastication at the top, a loop at the back and anti-slip protectors on the soles.

Jacket in sturdy fabric with a high stand-up collar, low-dropped shoulders and a wind flap with metal press-studs down the front. Patch pockets with a flap and press-studs, and a drawstring at the waist. Lined.
Fully lined one-shoulder swimsuit with decorative rings and a cut-out section at one side.
Wide jumper in a soft rib knit with wide ribbing around the neckline, dropped shoulders and long, slightly wider sleeves. Slightly longer at the back.
TOCA LIFE x H&M. Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved body in jersey with a yoke and sleeves in mesh. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, a seam at the hips and a microfibre lower section with press-studs at the crotch.
Gently fitted, long-sleeved, V-neck dress in viscose satin with sheer chiffon.
Cap in cotton twill with embroidered text on the front and an adjustable tab and fastener at the back.
Set with a cap in soft cotton jersey and bucket hat in cotton twill. Cap with an embroidered motif on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Lined bucket hat with an all-over print.
Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of leggings in soft cotton jersey with a glitter print. Top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Sports trousers in fast-drying fabric with an elasticated waist, pockets in the side seams, tapered legs and reflective details.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with a zip down the front and along one leg, long sleeves and full feet.
Flared, calf-length skirt in a patterned cotton weave with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a round neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
